title: Terms
content:
These are many game-specific terms that can appear in rules text. These are distinct from icons and from keywords that appear at the beginning of cards as stand-ins for rules text. The complete list of terms is:

  • Active
  • Attach
  • Discard
  • Dodge
  • Exhaust
  • Injury
  • In Play
  • Move
  • Scout
  • Search
